html.p: Splunk Mobile Access delivers a mobile-optimized version of Splunk Enterprise/Cloud dashboards, drill downs, reports and search. Splunk Administrators can choose the dashboards and reports available to mobile users. Users can set favorite dashboards and reports to quickly focus on the most relevant data. Mobile Access is enabled by the Splunk Mobile App – available for free from the Apple App Store, Google Play Store, or your in-house MDM marketplace. Once an access port is enabled by your Splunk administrator, the app can be used freely with your company data. The Splunk Add-On for Mobile Access should also be installed to enable many key features. See below for details.

ul.li: Splunk Mobile Access gives you a powerful way to view and analyze Splunk dashboards, reports and real-time alerts on Apple iOS and Android devices
Monitor key performance indicators from iOS and Android devices
Receive and act on real-time business and operational alerts
Easily view and analyze dashboards and reports
Annotate and share performance data with colleagues

html.h2: Deployment Option 1: Connect to Splunk Server Directly (Limited Functionality)

ul.li: If splunkd port is accessible by mobile app, devices can connect to Splunk server and work immediately

Functionality Limits:
No dashboard/reporting filtering configuration
No mobile notification
No SSO or DMZ support

html.h2: Deployment Option 2: Connect to Splunk Server via Splunk Add-on (Recommended)

ul.li: Download Splunk Add-on for Mobile Access from SplunkBase
Install in Splunk Search Head; search head clustering is supported
Enable mobile device to connect to Splunk Web
Supports:
Configuration of mobile access settings, dashboards and reports
Mobile notifications
SSO and MDM
DMZ deployment

html.h2: Deployment Option 3: DMZ Deployment with Splunk Add-on for Mobile Access

ul.li: Install and configure Splunk Add-on for Mobile Access (Same as deployment option 2)
Install reverse proxy server in DMZ
Configure reverse proxy sever – Apache, Nginx, IIS, etc

html.h2: MDM Wrapping for In-house App Store

ul.li: To support in-house app store, Splunk Mobile App supports MDM wrapping
Verified with Good Technology 2.5 and Mocana MAP
Only for iOS App
Contact Mobile Team if you plan to wrap Mobile App (mobile@splunk.com)
For customers who already use Single Sign-On (SSO) for Splunk Enterprise
Mobile App can leverage the same authentication mechanism as Splunk Enterprise
Verified SSO Services include: CAS 3.5.2, OpenAM 11.0.0, SAML

html.h2: Available on Apple App Store and Google Play

ul.li: iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch
Android 4.3 and above
Some verified devices include Google Nexus 5, Samsung S4 and Samsung S5 Android phones
